dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.message: I suggest we focus on identifying any suspicious behavior or inconsistencies in Charlie and Alice's actions to help narrow down the possible assassin. Let's keep an open communication channel throughout the game to ensure we make informed decisions.
